title: Memories: a short walk with Aunty Maude
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: Memories of Aunty Maude, a Gundijimara Elder
description: This is a documentary film about the childhood and life of Aunty Maude Alberts, a Gundijimara Elder and the filmmaker's grandmother. With her children and grandchildren Aunty Maude visits "the old place", a property outside of Heywood where she grew up. The film makes a poetic exploration of Aunty Maude's upbringing and the passing on of her traditional knowledge to her children and grandchildren.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006779; First Hand: five films; Active; 2005
